useCase.name: Generate Sales Report
useCase.description: Generate a report of sales data for the owner

preconditions.precondition: The owner requests a sales report

successEndConditions.condition: The sales report is successfully generated and displayed to the owner

mainSequence.step: Frontend Interface sends an API call to Backend System for sales data
Backend System queries Reporting Module to generate the sales report
Reporting Module fetches sales data from the Database
Reporting Module sends the sales report to Backend System
Backend System displays the sales report data to Frontend Interface
Frontend Interface shows the sales report to the Owner
